trans-unit.source: Specifies a property or field to update or a method to run using the CodeDom types.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
Gets or sets the code statement specifying the action to perform.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
Determines whether two object instances are equal.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
`true` if the objects are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
The hash code for this instance.
Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
A list of the fields and properties changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
Returns the string value of the action.
The string value of the action.
Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> contains errors (the Validate method returns false), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> had no errors; otherwise, `false`.
